meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lynda Ramsey Kyle Barrett Raisa Deber Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1038.

td.p: Lynda Ramsey, a registered nurse from Long Beach, California
Kyle Barrett, a graduate student from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Raisa Deber, a teacher from Toronto, Ontario (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,300)

tr.td: GEOGRAPHY
SINGERS
ABBREVIATIONS
'70s ADVERTISING
U.S. HISTORY
MOVIES IN OTHER WORDS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [to Lynda] West Germany, but we\'re accepting your response.)
(Alex: We\'re having trouble with the score readouts, but Raisa, you are still "Jeopardy!" champion.)
LyndaWhat are Germany and Austria
$100
KyleWhat are West Germany & Denmark
$5,500
RaisaWhat are West Germany & East Germany?
$700
(West) Germany & Austria')

3rd place: Oneida Silversmiths gift certificate

Kyle
Lynda

(including 1 DD),
